blogposts.title: Trip to Amalfi coast
blogposts.content: My trip to Amalfi coast was so amazing. We took a boat trip to get the best view on the coastline and watched a beautiful sunset.
blogposts.name: Theodor

blogposts.title: Paris the most romantic city to visit.
blogposts.content:
Last month i went to Paris with my husband.
We stayed near the Eiffel Tower and it was AMAAZIIING! So beautiful at night time with all the lights.
The food in Paris gets 5 stars from us, the people and the sourroundings makes you feel like youre in a movie.
blogposts.name: Sarah

pageComments.name: Christian
pageComments.comment: Nice! I really like reading your posts! :D

pageComments.name: Karen
pageComments.comment: Popular place! Its too crowded for me.

pageComments.name: Samantha
pageComments.comment: I always wanted to go there... hope you had a nice trip!

pageComments.name: Linda
pageComments.comment: I've been there too and i loved it!

pageComments.name: Angelina
pageComments.comment: I'm first to comment :D I need to go to Paris! Want to see the Eiffel Tower under the nightsky.
